**課程簡介**

本課程為接續德語（二）的課程。這學期的會話主題包括飲食習慣、談論自己的家人、公司的慶祝活動、居家的房間和布置、找房子、瞭解德國「住」的面向、以及談論嗜好與休閒活動。在文法的部分，學生將學習德語的情態助動詞、介系詞引領的格位變化、形容詞、過去簡單式和現在完成式。課程參與者需要密集的學習。

**英文簡介**

This course is the continuation of the course - German II. This semester, the conversation topics will focus on talking about your family, celebration in a company, furnishing in apartments, looking for and renting an apartment, living in Germany, and talking about hobbies and leisure activities. In terms of grammar, students will learn auxiliary verbs, rules of declension according to different prepositions, adjectives, the past and the perfect tense of German verbs. Intensive learning is strongly recommended.
